feature1.explanation: Both texts use a similar style of punctuation with the presence of commas, periods, and colons.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a formal and technical tone with legal terminology, indicating a similarity in lexical and grammatical features.

feature3.explanation: Both texts demonstrate a similar sentence structure with concise and informative statements.

feature4.explanation: Both texts maintain a formal and factual tone related to legal matters, suggesting a common style in text and discourse features.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as error-free writing, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is high.
